title: Did Facebook send Rock Brewster's files to the Department of Homeland Security, FBI?
subtitle: According to rumors, a Facebook window warns protestors that the history of their accounts is being intercepted by the federal government.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: :: Facebook windows indicate that the Ministry of Internal Security (acting under a bill known as CISPA) transmits a full Facebook history to Roc-static protestors to the Federal Bureau of Investigation.
